heading: Hi, I'm Syl Aucoin,

about.copy: I’m passionate about building — both with my hands and my heart.

With my hands - I find joy in creating. From furniture to pottery, inventing games, and trying new hobbies. This love for making has led me to web development, where coding feels like playing video games (and I really love games). Solving problems, exploring different approaches, and seeing ideas come to life keeps me excited to learn more.

With my heart - I’m a people person who thrives on connection. I enjoy listening, supporting, and helping others, whether by lending a hand, offering a fresh perspective, or just being someone people can count on. I believe positivity and community-building can make a meaningful difference.

projectsImgAriaLabel: A laptop and mobile mockup of:

projects.title: PC Optimum
projects.description: Dashboard page, Deals for You section, Mobile phone 2FA feature

projects.title: Monster Mash
projects.description: Heavily inspired by one of my favourite songs, the Monster Mash. A classic memory card game, which includes two modes (friendly and scary), three difficulty levels and a move counter.

projects.title: Oblique Strategies
projects.description: A take on Brian Eno's timeless lateral thinking deck. Allows the user to draw a random card from the Oblique Strategies, or from Collective Strategies deck which is populated by user submissions. The user can also tweet the strategy they picked.

projects.title: Sport Spot
projects.description: A pair programming project that uses geolocation to provide the user with sports facilities close to them for a variety of sports. Should the user choose to opt out of sharing their location, facilities are provided for selected cities.

projects.title: Shoe Kloset
projects.description: A fully responsive three page PSD conversion using flexbox and grid.

skillsCopy: Before attending Juno College, I spent nearly two decades honing skills in support, business operations, and culinary roles. This experience shaped me into a well-rounded developer with a unique blend of organizational, creative, technical, and interpersonal expertise.
skillsTop: My top skills include: Execution, interpersonal relationships, and project management.
